main event: On January 6, 1954, multiple witnesses in Toms River, New Jersey observed three unidentified aerial objects that exhibited unusual movement patterns.
interesting points: The objects appeared to circle each other and sometimes hovered in stationary positions., A witness estimated the objects were moving at speeds between 2000 and 3000 mph., The objects were described as round or slightly oval and emitted no sound., Observers reported the color of the objects as pale red or orange, and they changed in brightness., The longest sighting duration reported was 90 minutes before the objects streaked off to the southwest.
